alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:24PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Broadwater and west central Meagher Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 423 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Townsend, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Townsend and Silos. This includes Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 3 , and between mile markers 72 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central and southwestern Montana.
